message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $700,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, $700,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to consider $600,000 as a more reasonable price. I believe this is a fair compromise.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $600,000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $650,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $650,000. I'm willing to offer $620,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that $620,000 is still a bit lower than what I was hoping for, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $630,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you and the effort I'm putting into this negotiation.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $630,000. I'm willing to offer $610,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me and the negotiations we've had so far.

I understand that $610,000 is still a bit lower than what I was hoping for, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $615,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you and the effort I'm putting into this negotiation. I'm not willing to go any lower, so I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $615,000. I'm willing to offer $605,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me and the negotiations we've had so far.

Bob, I understand that you're still not satisfied with the price, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $615,000 and $605,000. I'm now offering the product to you for $610,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
